name: Gabriel's Dollar Coin Run
description:
It's a new arcade game when you play as mini Gabriel and collect as many dollar coins as you can in four amazing worlds, the bully area, the city, the jungle and the ocean. As you collect dollar coins, make sure you watch out for bullies, the city crook, hotel guests dropping water balloons, apes, reptiles, a sleeping tiger, piranhas, electric eels and the most dangerous of all, a giant octopus!

controls:

Move: left and right arrow keys

Jump: shift

Climb: up and down arrow keys
